com.facebook.buck.command

Class Project

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.command.Project

  • public class Project
extends Object
    Utility to map the build files in a project built with Buck into a collection of metadata files so that the project can be built with IntelliJ. This uses a number of heuristics specific to our repository at Facebook that does not make this a generally applicable solution. Hopefully over time, the Facebook-specific logic will be removed.

    • Field Detail

      • ANDROID_GEN_DIR

        public static final String ANDROID_GEN_DIR
        This directory is analogous to the gen/ directory that IntelliJ would produce when building an Android module. It contains files such as R.java, BuildConfig.java, and Manifest.java.

        By default, IntelliJ generates its gen/ directories in our source tree, which would likely mess with the user's use of glob(['**&#x2f;*.java']). For this reason, we encourage users to target

        See Also:
